Vindictus.[CMTY] GM Coin S4: Welcoming Sanyaa:
]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3953157/4e9a70a9676f655905c82d4221b3fac7ec9267d4.jpg[/img]

[b]Event Period:[/b]
7/23/2024 (Tue) after weekly maintenance - 8/12/2024 (Mon) before maintenance


Mercenaries,

Have you all heard the news that a newcomer is arriving next month?

While we wait for her arrival, we invite you all to our new community event: Welcoming Sanyaa!

Participate in the event by presenting her a handmade portrait!


[b]Reward Information:[/b][list]
[*] If more than 60 portraits are entered through our Discord event channel, then all players will receive 10 GM Coins during the 8/12/2024 (Mon) maintenance.
[*] If there are not enough participants, then only those who participated will receive a coupon code.
[*] Some entries may be used in future social posts or other places.
[*] You may not participate multiple times.[/list]


[b]Information Needed to Participate:[/b][list]
[*] Server

Vindictus.[UPDATE] Ver. 3.14 Update Note:
Cairde System[/b]

 
[list][*]You can see all the characters in your account at once with the new Cairde system.[list][*]Complete the "About ID: Cairde" story to obtain the Cairde Name Change Coupon, available once per account.[/*][*]When the Cairde Name is changed, the previous name cannot be used again for 30 days.[/*][/list][/*][*]When changing the name with the Cairde Name Change Coupon, Cairde Names in the Send/Receive Friend Invite List will be applied upon logging in again.
[/*][*] Cairde Names listed in the Marketplace when registering items, in the Guild Storage log, or as the Chat name before the Cairde Name change will not themselves be changed.[/*][/list]
 
[list][*]A "Cairde" menu is added to the Menu (T) UI.[list][*]You can search Cairde Names through an exact Cairde Name match or a character name.[/*][*]Blocking a Cairde will block all characters in that Cairde at once.[/*][*]Cairde Block and existing character blocks will stack.[/*][/list][/*][/list]
 
[list][*] You can check the characters, levels, login info, and guild names for each character in a Cairde you search for.[/*][*]If a player that you've blocked changes Cairde Names, then the Cairde shown on the UI for that character will change upon logging in again.[list][*]Cairde Block's Cairde Name[/*][*]Friend > Block Setting's Cairde Name[/*][/list][/*][*]The Cairde Name will be shown above the character's head.[list][*]You can choose to show the Cairde Names of other players or yourself through the Show Cairde Name option in Options > ETC.[/*][/list][/*][*]The Cairde Name will be shown in chat.[list][*]You may choose to show the Cairde Name in chat through the "Show Cairde Name" in chat options.[/*][/list][/*][*]You can also see the Cairde Name in the following categories:[list][*]Cairde Name of the character registering an item to sell at the Marketplace.[/*][*]Cairde Name of the character making crafting requests at a Display Stand.[/*][*]Receive/Send Invites, and blocked characters', Cairde Name.[/*][*]Guild > Guild Members tab characters' Cairde Name.[/*][*]Cairde Name of the character in Guild Storage log.[/*][*]View Character Info.[/*][*]Character Intro during battle departure.[/*][/list][/*][*] Names listed in the Marketplace when registering items, and the Guild Storage log, before the Cairde system update will not show those Cairde Names.[/*][/list]
 
[list][*]You can kick guild members from a guild by their Cairde Name.[list][*]Administrators and higher can kick all characters in the same Cairde from the guilld at once, through [Kick Cairde] in the Guild > Management tab.[/*][*]You cannot use the [Kick Cairde] option on the Guild Master's Cairde.[/*][*]You cannot use the [Kick Cairde] option for players who have a character with the same rank as you. (Administrators may not kick out other Administrators.)[/*][*]You cannot use the [Kick Cairde] option on your own Cairde.[/*][/list][/*
